title: Lignite Coal
description: Since a few updates ago, processing Coal Ore in an Industrial Grinder you get two Small Pile of Lignite Coal Ore Dust, which can be further compressed in Lignite Coal Plates. I noticed that you can use Lignite Coal "Gem" as fuel in a GT Coal Boiler, but I haven't the original mod this item comes from. So my question is: is it there any use for Lignite Coal Dust or Lignite Coal Plate in GT without the mod Lignite Coal comes from? Thank you.

replies.body: Kinda, they will still work as a fuel, you just won't be able to make it. I think.

Lignite Coal comes from Highlands, a biome generation mod.
Consider reporting its un-usability (without Highlands) to Greg as a bug.
Yeah, maybe we can suggest him to make Lignite Coal Plates useful as Lignite Coal "gems" in IC2 Generators or GT Coal Boilers. Also it would be nice to add a page on the wiki about Lignite Coal.
